not rounds so turn at the end of each row 1 magic_ring 3 ch1 turn 2 slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet slip_stitch single_crochet in next single_crochet 1sc in last single_crochet ch2 turn 3 you finished the wing 1 single_crochet along the top edge of the wing up until the elbow ~5 2 mark a line from this elbow to the the 1st ch3 turn and slip_stitch along this line 3 chain 2 slip_stitch 1 then slip_stitch all the way back to the elbow on the back of the wing where you can only see a kind of dashed line folding the wing makes this easier 4 slip_stitch in the elbow then mark a 2nd
